Package com.veraxsystems.vxipmi.coding.security

Authentication, confidentiality and integrity algorithms.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthenticationAlgorithm
    Interface for authentication algorithms.
    AuthenticationRakpHmacSha1
    RAKP-HMAC-SHA1 authentication algorithm.
    AuthenticationRakpNone
    RAKP-None authentication algorithm.
    CipherSuite
    Provides cipher suite (authentication, confidentiality and integrity algorithms used during the session).
    ConfidentialityAesCbc128
    AES-CBC-128 confidentiality algorithm
    ConfidentialityAlgorithm
    Interface for Confidentiality Algorithms.
    ConfidentialityNone
    Class representing no confidentiality algorithm.
    IntegrityAlgorithm
    Interface for Integrity Algorithms.
    IntegrityHmacSha1_96
    HMAC-SHA1-96 integrity algorithm.
    IntegrityNone
    Class representing RAKP-None integrity algorithm
    SecurityConstants
    Set of constants.

Package com.veraxsystems.vxipmi.coding.security Description

Authentication, confidentiality and integrity algorithms. To implement custom authentication algorithm extend AuthenticationAlgorithm class. To implement custom confidentiality algorithm extend ConfidentialityAlgorithm class. To implement custom integrity algorithm extend IntegrityAlgorithm class.
